document.full_text: anyone can buy a t-shirt from the broadway musical 'how to succeed in business without really trying,' but it takes a truly determined theatergoer to pay $5,000 for a bow tie drenched with daniel radcliffe's sweat.
document.title: how to take home a piece of daniel radcliffe
lines_and_colors: anyone can buy a t-shirt from the broadway musical 'how to succeed in business without really trying,' but it takes a truly determined theatergoer to pay $5,000 for a bow tie drenched with daniel radcliffe's sweat.
